question.questionText: One way of modifying your solar house was to include a heat sink such as a container of water or masses of rock. What is the advantage of including a heat sink in a house?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: A heat sink would absorb heat during the daytime and release the heat during the nighttime to keep the house warmer longer.
